name: Heating Oil: Tanker Truck Sim
description:
Heating Oil: Tanker Truck Sim - Drive heavy trucks and attach huge fuel tankers with it. Driving on hill is a difficult task for you as a cargo oil truck driver. You need to transport fuel to factories or petrol stations. Let’s go off-road and show your extreme driving skills.
Features of this game
Amazing 3d City environment with twist of off road truck driving experience.
Exciting Levels to Enjoy
Different type of oil stations
Different Camera Angles to explore the 3D off Road Environment
